name: autohide the menu & sidebar [The Jakarta Post]
description: Hides The Jakarta Post's header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.)
additional_info: This style is for www.thejakartapost.com. The thin red and blue strips at the left edge of the screen are the collapsed header, footer, and sidebar. Mouse over a strip to restore the element. 01 Jul: Removed adverts that interfered with header placement in Chrome. (Why is it always Chrome?) 03 Nov: Layout changes broke the style badly. Fixed; refactored.
